Texts.Chs: 如果没有^green;萃取设备^reset;，你在FU中的进程将很艰难。这些奇妙的设备能够^green;利用资源并将它们转换为有用的内容^reset;。试着在在^orange;加工台^reset;建造一台^orange;研磨机^reset;。你可以在^orange;工程学^reset;分支中^green;研究^reset;相关内容。
Texts.Eng: Without ^green;Extraction Devices^reset; progression in FU will be arduous. These wonderful devices ^green;take resource stacks and convert them into useful stuff^reset;. Create a ^orange;Hand Mill^reset; built at a ^orange;Machining Table^reset;. You can ^green;Research^reset; it in the ^orange;Engineering^reset; branch.

Texts.Chs: 你也可以把食物，种子，肉类和其他物品放入萃取器。^green;什么都可以放进去试试^reset;。你永远不知道你下一秒会发现什么！升级到^orange;物质萃取器^reset;，你的工作速度会^green;大幅^reset;加快。
Texts.Eng: You can also place food, seeds, meats and numerous other goods into extractors. ^green;Try everything you can^reset;. You never know what you'll discover! Upgrading to an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset; will allow you to work ^green;much^reset; faster.
